page.title: 11CLUBS AND ORGANISATIONS 1
page.content: If you want to belong to a club or organisation then Holmes Chapel is the place to be! We spoke to 246 children aged 8 to 11 at Holmes Chapel County Primary and discovered that 60% of them and 51% of their parents are active members of at least 1 club or organisation. There are 3 packs of cubs, 4 of brownies, 3 of guides and 2 troop of scouts. The Victoria Club, the Leisure Centre and Youth Club are open to all residents and offer snooker, bowls, cricket, tennis, darts, aerobics, chess, badminton, table tennis, basketball, volleyball, golf, hockey and other sports. Fisons Club caters mainly for employees and offers sporting and social activities. Fund raising organisations include Round Table, Rotary, Lions and 3 P.T.A.s
